alert.note: Alert for Grundy; La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:23PM CDT until March 26 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central La Salle County in north central Illinois... Northwestern Grundy County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grand Ridge, or near Marseilles, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Morris, Minooka, Marseilles and Seneca. Including the following interstate... I-80 between mile markers 96 and 120. This includes... Gebhard Woods State Park, Grundy County Speedway and Fairgrounds, Illini State Park, and William G Stratton State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
